title: Cuneiform Jokes
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about the creepy Standard hotel in DTLA, how IMDb and Wikipedia are not reliable sources, the paparazzi frenzy at the Vanity Fair Oscar Party and more!
Have something interesting you want to share with us? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or record a message at www.speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
